id.description: The unique identifier of this exchanged document.

additionalIdentifiers.description: Additional identifiers for specific needs, for example required by national agency such as customs

issueDateTime.description: Date of issue. The date, time, date time or other date time value for the issuance of this exchanged document. ISO 8601 is the recommended standard to represent date and time: https://www.iso.org/iso-8601-date-and-time-format.html

originalIssuedQuantity.description: The number of originals issued of this exchanged document. This may include the number in letters

documentStatus.description: The code specifying the status of this exchanged document.

copyIssuedQuantity.description: The number of copies issued of this exchanged document.

issueLocation.description: Place of issue. The location where this exchanged document has been issued.

contractualClause.description: Contractual clauses. A contractual clause of this exchanged document.

firstSignatoryAuthentication.description: The first or primary signature that authenticates this exchanged document.
